text: Great post and thanks for sharing your experience.  Have you looked at using OpenSUSE from Novell?  It will provide you with the Mono environment pre-configured.  I started with that and installed the things I needed from there.  In my case I needed Mongo DB and it was fairly easy.  It seems that Ubuntu takes extra steps, and hence your post.
Ubuntu comes with a Mono environment pre-configured, it just wasn't bleeding edge like the one I wanted!
